name: Rocketman
description:
This game was made solely to meet the value of the Game Development class.  In this game, the player must avoid the rocket that's coming to them and score the highest score possible.

Rules: The player only got 1 life, the road keeps rolling until the player died, the player cannot attack or destroy the rocket

Resources: Collecting points as many as possible

Conflicts: Obstacles (the rockets)

Boundaries & Outcome: The score and players cannot play outside the viewport (screen)

source code (gitlab): https://gitlab.com/afihidayat/rocketman
